name: strong
features: Performance Enhancements: Increase blood flow and reduce muscle vibration during play, practice, and workouts Eliminate or reduce sliding rash on knees and shins Improve muscle recovery after games, practices, and training Allow players to wear their preferred sock and shoe combination
Increase blood flow and reduce muscle vibration during play, practice, and workouts
Eliminate or reduce sliding rash on knees and shins
Improve muscle recovery after games, practices, and training
Allow players to wear their preferred sock and shoe combination
Play Harder, Longer: Graduated compression increases blood flow by dilating arteries by 40%, providing more oxygen and helping legs feel rested and "live" during the game
Keep Your Legs Cool: Increased blood flow helps maintain a cool and fresh feeling while playing
Reduce Injuries: Compression reduces muscle and tendon vibration, keeping everything in place and reducing injury potential
Faster Recovery: Helps with post-game recovery by removing lactic acid, boosting blood flow, and enhancing oxygen delivery; wear for an hour after playing for noticeable results
